snippet.title: WAVEN | PC Early Access Launch Trailer | Ankama Games
snippet.description:
Play now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2343650/Waven/
Play now on the Ankama Launcher: https://www.ankama.com/en/launcher
Subscribe so you don't miss a thing: https://www.waven-game.com/
 
WAVEN is now available everywhere in Early Access for PC and Mac.
Cross the seas, fight epic battles against ferocious monsters, gather tons of loot, and upgrade your spell sand items to create the ultimate deck. Complete more than 250 zany quests alone or with your friends, or challenge other players in the PvP arena.
 
The WAVEN adventure is waiting for you.
 
WAVEN is a new roleplaying game experience that is accessible, fun and immersive. It combines adventure and turn-based strategy, inspired by the best tactical RPGs, with deckbuilding mechanics and valuable items to collect. It can be played for free online on PC, Mac, smartphone and tablet.

Follow WAVEN: 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@waven_game
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/waven_game/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/waven
Twitter: https://twitter.com/WAVEN_Game
